snippet: The swing was efficient as ever, and the ball soared toward the far end of the range with a tight draw as Hunter Mahan held his pose....

headline.print_headline: Mahan Wants to Stay in Hunt for Stretch Drive
headline.main: Mahan Wants to Stay in Hunt for Stretch Drive

lead_paragraph: The swing was efficient as ever, and the ball soared toward the far end of the range with a tight draw as Hunter Mahan held his pose.
